entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has heard the exciting news.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is introduced as the one who has been given a brand-new silver badge.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the brother of Percy.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is introduced as the mother of the twins and Percy.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as the twin brother of Fred.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as the sister of Percy and George.
